reviews.title: Excellent Service
reviews.text: AJA visions / Aidan has filmed and edited a number of sections for myself for a menâ€™s mental health documentary and has been able to produce my vision exactly how I wanted it if not more so. Over the past few months he has been extremely attentive with quick responses whilst also helping develop old ideas further to create a more complete project. Aidan has been an absolute pleasure to work alongside on this project and I hope to carry on collaborating in the future!

reviews.title: Good, but room for improvement
reviews.text: Aidan skillfully curated an outstanding video for my establishment, Strive Barber in Frodsham. I am thoroughly pleased with the results, and his editing expertise truly elevated the representation of my barber/tattoo company. Highly recommended for top-notch video production.

reviews.title: Disappointed with the product
reviews.text: I have had the privilege of collaborating with Aidan for several months, and I am truly impressed by the exceptional quality of work he has delivered. His contributions have significantly enriched my projects, and I wholeheartedly recommend his services!
